page.title: 16EDUCATION IN CASTLEFORD
page.content: There are 2922 children to 170 teachers(including the heads and part timers).On average there are 17 children to 1 teacher.There is 1 High School,4 Middle Schools,5 First Schools and 2 Nursery Schools. No schools have corporal punishment. All schools make children miss playtimes.3 schools send for parents.2 schools give lines.2 schools use loss of priveliges (miss school trips and clubs).The High School uses extra work,letters home and suspension. Nurseries,First and Middle Schools have no real timetable except for hall times.At the nurseries children play more but do some writing.Middle schools do topic based work,maths,art & craft activities,music and games.Older children have French.The High School has a strict timetable.
